QuestData.Title: A Royal Summons
QuestData.Description: Well met, $p. I have come on behalf of King Anduin Wrynn.$B$BMy crew is preparing for a special mission, and the king would like you to join us. Please review this official summons and, if you are satisfied, return with me to Stormwind Harbor.$B$B<Rogers hands you a sealed envelope.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Royal Summons and follow Sky Admiral Rogers through the portal to Stormwind Harbor.
